description.brief: URDF description of the KURTana robot

package.description:
This package contains an URDF description of the KURTana Robot and all supporting mesh files.
NOTICE: the construction is custom-made, so it's relatively unlikely that it serves for more than an exemplar but if you have comments or questions regarding the KURTana project, feel free to contact us
package.author: Henning Deeken
